005
006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.tools.cli.core.commands;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.CLIProcessor.CallingContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.CommandExecutionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.cli.processor.command.ICommandExecutor;
011
012import org.apache.commons.cli.CommandLine;
013import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
014import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017
018public abstract class AbstractDeprecatedOscalValidationSubcommand
019    extends AbstractOscalValidationCommand {
020  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(AbstractDeprecatedOscalValidationSubcommand.class);
021
022  @Override
023  public ICommandExecutor newExecutor(CallingContext callingContext, CommandLine commandLine) {
024    return new CommandExecutor(callingContext, commandLine);
025  }
026
027  protected final class CommandExecutor
028      extends AbstractOscalValidationCommand.OscalValidationCommandExecutor {
029
030    private CommandExecutor(
031        @NonNull CallingContext callingContext,
032        @NonNull CommandLine commandLine) {
033      super(callingContext, commandLine);
034    }
035
036    @Override
037    public void execute() throws CommandExecutionException {
038      LOGGER.atWarn().log("This command path is deprecated. Please use 'validate'.");
039
040      super.execute();
041    }
042  }
043}
